name: Backgammon
description: The classic board game of all times, with gorgeous graphics, computer opponent, and intuitive interface.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel multi core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2010 GPU DirectX: Version 7.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space
